titleInfo.title: MOUNT HOOD COOPER SPUR LAND EXCHANGE CLARIFICATION ACT

extension.searchTitle: MOUNT HOOD COOPER SPUR LAND EXCHANGE CLARIFICATION ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 34

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Mount Hood Cooper Spur Land Exchange Clarification Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 699, to amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to modify provisions relating to certain land exchanges in the Mt. Hood Wilderness in the State of Oregon, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 415 yeas to 1 nay, Roll No. 100;

titleInfo.title: NOTICE OF INTENTION TO OFFER RESOLUTION RAISING A QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE

extension.searchTitle: NOTICE OF INTENTION TO OFFER RESOLUTION RAISING A QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 34

congVote.result: So the motion to table was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Representative Pascrell rose to a question of the privileges of the House and submitted a resolution. The Chair ruled that the resolution did not present a question of the privileges of the House. Subsequently, Representative Pascrell appealed the ruling of the chair and Representative McCarthy moved to table the appeal. Agreed to the motion to table the appeal of the ruling of the Chair by a recorded vote of 229 ayes to 185 noes with two answering ``present'', Roll No. 101.

titleInfo.title: COLTSVILLE NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK DONATION SITE AMENDMENT

extension.searchTitle: COLTSVILLE NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK DONATION SITE AMENDMENT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 34

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Facilitating the addition of park administration at the Coltsville National Historical Park
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 863, to facilitate the addition of park administration at the Coltsville National Historical Park, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 369 yeas to 42 nays, Roll No. 102; and

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate resumed consideration of the nomination of Ryan Zinke, of Montana, to be Secretary of the Interior.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 67 yeas to 31 nays, 1 responding present (Vote No. 74), Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.
